scratcher:bump.description: bump the major/minor version number in the packageDirectory

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

major.name: major
major.description: Bump the major version by 1, sets minor,build to 0

target.name: target
target.description: name of your package directory (defaults to force-app)

scratcher:create.description: Create a scratch org, install deps & pushes code
examples:
$ sfdx scratcher:create
        It will create the scratch orgs, install all of the dependancies, push the source code and assign the permssion of the app

loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

days.name: days
days.description: Days for the sandbox to live
